(function(global){global.wrappers['/Users/lqez/Dev/summernote/test/base/module/Fullscreen.spec.js']=[function(require,module,exports,__dirname,__filename){ "use strict";
/**
 * Fullscreen.spec.js
 * (c) 2015~ Summernote Team
 * summernote may be freely distributed under the MIT license./
 */
exports.__esModule = true;
var chai_1 = require("chai");
var jquery_1 = require("jquery");
var Context_1 = require("../../../src/js/base/Context");
var Fullscreen_1 = require("../../../src/js/base/module/Fullscreen");
require("../../../src/js/bs4/settings");
describe('Fullscreen', function () {
    var expect = chai_1["default"].expect;
    var fullscreen, context;
    beforeEach(function () {
        var options = jquery_1["default"].extend({}, jquery_1["default"].summernote.options);
        context = new Context_1["default"](jquery_1["default"]('<div><p>hello</p></div>'), options);
        fullscreen = new Fullscreen_1["default"](context);
    });
    it('should toggle fullscreen mode', function () {
        expect(fullscreen.isFullscreen()).to.be["false"];
        fullscreen.toggle();
        expect(fullscreen.isFullscreen()).to.be["true"];
        fullscreen.toggle();
        expect(fullscreen.isFullscreen()).to.be["false"];
    });
});
